import{LOG_IN}from'./LoginActions';var initialState={loggedInUser:null};/**
 * LogIn reducer to update the part of state of the application
 * @param state: Current state value
 * @param action: action received
 * @returns {*} current updated state value
 * @constructor
 */var LogIn=function LogIn(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case LOG_IN:return Object.assign({},state,{loggedInUser:action.user});default:return state;}};export default LogIn;
